**Test Instructions:**
1. Both views start collapsed (showing 'Thinking...' with animated dots)
2. Tap the first collapsed view to expand and start typing animation
3. Use the chevron button to collapse it again
4. Tap the second collapsed view to expand and start its typing
5. Try having both expanded simultaneously
